title: Is human curiosity gives a life that is more interesting to live even if it can destroy? - Quora

response.answer_text: UNDOUBTEDLY. Homo Sapiens the THINKER is the MOST CURIOUS and inquisitive of all animals to ever evolve on Planet Earth. In a span of about 70,000 years HUMANS have left the caves,trees and jungles which was their HOME to the CIVILISATION of the 21st century. Human evolution was bloody and gruesome across the millennia, but always progressing for a better life for the REST of the species. The last 500 years has been mindblowing in terms of the SCIENTIFIC revolution and DISCOVERIES. Humans have constantly pushed the boundaries of KNOWLEDGE and PHYSICAL barriers and are continuing to do much more now.

We are created by God to learn that life is continuest learning !! that's interesting When we depart & time to meet your Faith!! The things we never consider interesting? Become very interesting Balance is key bro
